title: Nexxus Hyrda Sleek Silken Smoothing Conditioner - 13.5-Ounce Bottle
description: Nexxus Hydra Sleek Silken Smoothing Conditioner -- 13.5 oz.Hydra Sleek Silken Smoothing Conditioner, with a lightweight blend of silk amino acids and avocado oil, conditions and seals the hair shaft to lock out humidity for long-lasting smoothness.

title: MASH Matte Nail Polish Top Coat 15ml
description:
Luster-free matte polishes are taking the nail polish world by storm. Do you love a nice flat matte, but don't want to double your nail polish budget and collection? Than check out the newest nail polish from MASH! This matte top coat can be applied to any polish turning it in to a flat matte finish. This gives you the ability to create limitless matte nail polish options with just this product and your own nail polish collections. We promise you will autoMATTEically fall in love with this new top coat polish. Matte top coats are always in, and this MASH's unique, durable and long lasting formula has been garnering rave reviews! This matte top coat can also be applied to matte polishes to create a longer lasting and more durable matte finish. Don't be left out of the matte nail polish trend, hurry and get yours NOW. Remember, there is always 2 sides to every nail polish!                                                               
Directions:                                                         
Apply your favorite Nail Polish color and allow to dry.  Apply a thin layer of the MASH Matte Nail Polish as your top coat to transform your shiny polish to matte.

title: Sinful Colors Professional Nail Enamel 113 Dream On
description: Glorious, gorgeous colors on your fingers. It will complete your outfit and expresses your mood. Toluene, formaldehyde & DBP free. Made in USA
